attributes.additional_details:
To Gov of Pakistan & PEMRA


Geo channel & Jang group has lost all credibility by repetitive attacks on National institutions & integrity. It has vested interests & malicious intent. It is disliked by masses.
The last nail in their coffin is telecasting disrespectful statements/sentiments against pristine religious personalities, values & entities which are immensely sacred to Muslim Ummah.
This is intolerable & unacceptable to all Pakistanis as well as muslims across the world.
We demand that all transmissions & publications of Geo & Jang be stopped with immediate effect.
